Package org.lightsleep.component

Classes that are used to configure the SQL, such as condition and expression.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Condition
    A interface of condition for SQL.
    SqlComponent
    An interface of SQL components.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    And
    Configures AND of conditions.
    EntityCondition<E>
    Configure a condition using the value of the primary key of an entity.
    Expression
    Configures an expression with a string content and an array of argument objects embedded in the string.
    GroupBy
    Configures GROUP BY of SQL.
    LogicalCondition
    The abstract superclass of And and Or.
    Not
    Configure the negative condition.
    Or
    Configures OR of conditions.
    OrderBy
    Configures ORDER BY of SQL.
    OrderBy.Element
    The element of OrderBy.
    SqlString
    This class will be uses to convert the value into a SQL string.
    SubqueryCondition<SE>
    Configure a condition to use a subquery.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogicalCondition.Operator
    Logical operator.

Package org.lightsleep.component Description

Classes that are used to configure the SQL, such as condition and expression.
